name: Cluster Cloner
shortDescription: Kubernetes offers a standard model for orchestrating containers. But the models for infra on which K8s runs are highly nonstandard.  This project clones clusters across clouds, exploring these models.
longDescription: Kubernetes offers a standard model for orchestrating containers. But the models for infra on which K8s runs are highly nonstandard.  This project clones clusters across clouds, exploring these models.
